scripts.android-bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android-release: cd android && gradlew clean && cd .. && npm run android-bundle && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-release2: cd android && gradlew clean && cd .. && npm run android-bundle && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* android/app/src/main/res/raw && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-release-bundle: cd android && gradlew clean && cd .. && npm run android-bundle && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* android/app/src/main/res/raw && cd android && gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-debug: cd android && gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native run-android
